Html:
I'm trying to build the projects in the BasicMVVM.Tests.AcceptanceTest solution but am receiving build errors for a strange configuration combination

Debug|BPC??

Error 1 The specified solution configuration "Debug|BPC" is invalid. Please specify a valid solution configuration using the Configuration and Platform properties (e.g. MSBuild.exe Solution.sln /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform="Any CPU") or leave those properties blank to use the default solution configuration.[C:\Downloads\PRISM\PRISM4drop2\Quickstarts\BasicMVVM\BasicMVVM.sln] C:\Downloads\PRISM\PRISM4drop2\Quickstarts\BasicMVVM\BasicMVVM.sln.metaproj BasicMVVM.Tests.AcceptanceTest
Error 2 The specified solution configuration "Debug|BPC" is invalid. Please specify a valid solution configuration using the Configuration and Platform properties (e.g. MSBuild.exe Solution.sln /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform="Any CPU") or leave those properties blank to use the default solution configuration. [C:\Downloads\PRISM\PRISM4drop2\Quickstarts\BasicMVVM\BasicMVVM.sln] C:\Downloads\PRISM\PRISM4drop2\Quickstarts\BasicMVVM\BasicMVVM.sln.metaproj BasicMVVM.Tests.AcceptanceTest
Error 3 The command "C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\msbuild.exe "C:\Downloads\PRISM\PRISM4drop2\Quickstarts\BasicMVVM\BasicMVVM.Tests.AcceptanceTest\..\BasicMVVM.sln" /p:configuration=Debug" exited with code 1. BasicMVVM.Tests.AcceptanceTest

It all looks ok in configuration manager. ANy ideas?

found the answer here http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en/windowsazure/thread/fe7f073f-ecc2-4bfb-953b-89f7dc12ce24

there was an environment var named Platform with a value of BPC - delete it
